Name: Oyster Stew
Description: The taste is a little bitter, but it's very good.

DescriptionLocalization.es: El sabor es un poco amargo, pero es muy bueno.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Der Geschmack ist etwas bitter, aber sehr gut.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Le goût est un peu amer, mais c'est très bon.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Az íze kicsit kesernyés, de nagyon jó.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Il sapore è un po' amaro, ma è molto buono.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 味は少し苦いですが、とても美味しいです。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: O gosto é um pouco amargo, porém, está muito bom.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Вкус немного горьковат, но это очень хорошо.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Tadı biraz acı ama çok güzel.
